title: loving alpha client
body: alpha clients nice in style and i quite like the way its set out so far haven't found any bugs liking it so far good work rito

replies.body: I'm downloading it now, but my friends say champ select is very buggy, give a test if you can.
Network connection between legacy and alpha, to be expected until beta. Spread the word of this around, been discussed months ago.
im playing on aram at teh moment its not ttoo bad on aram but will paly summoners soon just noticed one small bug for ranked stats was dispalying random champs that i dont play or even own
